name: Chili Lime Peanuts
description: These chili-lime peanuts are completely addictive and absolutely perfect for munching with a cold beer or, better yet, a margarita....
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup freshly squeezed lime juice (2 or 3 large limes)
Freshly grated zest of one lime

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 250ºF. Whisk lime juice, lime zest, chili powder, salt, sugar, and cayenne pepper together in large bowl. Add peanuts and stir until evenly coated. Scrape nuts onto large, rimmed baking sheet. Bake until nuts are fragrant, dry, and beginning to darken, about 30 minutes.
